asking them if they are intersted in joining the course course details link is as below
examplelink.com

preview.subject: Opportunity to Join Our Course
preview.body:
Dear Yash,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to see if you would be interested in joining our upcoming course. You can find the details at the following link: examplelink.com.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Siddhant Kore
